articles.title: Both Spider-Man 2's Post-Credits Scenes, Explained - Kotaku
articles.description: Who was that at the end, and what does it mean for future games?
articles.content: Marvels Spider-Man 2is out, and that means we can talk about the games post-credits content and how the big PlayStation sequel seems to set up some very interesting, and very predictable, scenarios f… [+5999 chars]
